quizTitle: PepsiCo Company, Brands, and Sustainability Quiz
description: A comprehensive quiz covering PepsiCo, its brands, values, and sustainability initiatives (pep+).

questions.corpus: A safer-commute policy that supports women’s retention is:

questions.corpus: “Doxxing” refers to:

options.text: Publishing private personal information online without consent

options.text: Co-design and test with diverse women users, including low-connectivity contexts

options.text: Budgeting, savings, credit management, and digital payments
